What to do: Lie down on bench flat bench, with dumbbell in each hand. Palms facing each other
Press dumbbells up. This will be starting position
With a slight bend in elbows, inhale and lower arms out at both sides in a wide arc until you feel stretch on chest
Exhale and return to starting position
Do NOT: Use arms to perform movement. Only shoulder joints should be moving

What to do: Grip the bar about shoulder width
Lift bar from rack, hold straight over chest with arms locked. This is starting position
Inhale and lower bar slowly, until it touches your middle chest
Exhale and push bar back up to starting position using your chest muscles
Lock arms and squeeze chest at top for a second
Do NOT: Bench heavy weight without a spotter
Bounce weight off chest. Be in control of barbell and weight the entire time
Let the barbell drift away from the middle of chest
